may 25th 2020 the world watches in shock
as 46 year old george floyd dies in
minneapolis during an arrest for
allegedly using a counterfeit twenty
dollar bill
he dies at the hands of police officer
derek chalvin
who kneels on floyd's neck for nearly
nine minutes while handcuffing him face
down in the street
floyd is seen on video repeatedly
stating that he can't breathe
a second and third officer assists
chauvin in restraining floyd
while a fourth officer prevents
bystanders from intervening
the horrified onlookers record video of
the incident
while pleading with the officers to
release their hold on floyd to no avail
moments later a hennepin county
ambulance arrives
and floyd is whisked away to the
hennepin county medical center
where he will later be pronounced dead
at 9 25
following the release of the security
camera footage all four police officers
were fired the very next day
javin was initially charged with third

manslaughter

j alexander kung thomas lane and dole
tau
were all charged with aiding and

at the time of this report the fbi and

apprehension are currently investigating
the incident
the horrific video footage went viral on
the internet sparking outrage
and triggering demonstrations and
protests around the world
including more than 75 united states
cities the world was already reeling
with the after effects of coronavirus
but the death of george floyd brought
the volatile issues of police brutality
and racism back to the forefront of the
american psyche
was the death of george floyd just
another example of systematic racism
and an oppressive police force or is
there more to the story than meets the
eye
in this special report we examine the
details of that may 25th incident
as well as the history connections and
coincidences
involved in the killing of george floyd
monday may 25th 2020 7
57 pm george floyd a bouncer originally
from houston texas
arrives at the cup food store in the
neighborhood of powderhorn
near downtown minneapolis he enters the
store with two friends
and purchases cigarettes with what the
staff later claimed was a counterfeit 20
bill floyd returns to his car a blue suv

foods
who asked for the cigarettes back
according to the

and not in control of himself 808 pm

moments later he holsters his gun and
pulls floyd out of the vehicle
where a struggle ensues and kung comes
to assist
he is handcuffed pressed against the

from there lane and kung will escort
floyd across the street
where he will be put into a police car
8 14 pm floyd lane and
head to the police car where he falls to

he doesn't want to enter the car because

a few minutes later at 8 17 pm a squad

almost immediately a struggle ensues and

20 pm footage shows chauvin kneeling on

with kung and lane helping restrain him
officer tao stands nearby
interacting with the bystanders floyd
repeatedly states that he can't breathe
and the other officers call for medical
assistance stating that he's bleeding

8 21 pm the police call has now been
upgraded
to a request for emergency medical

of which will end up being a total of

according to the initial report lane
asked shoving if floyd should be rolled

to which showman replies no by 8 25 pm
floyd appears to lose consciousness and

shoving continues to keep his knee on

9 25 pm george floyd dies at hennepin

to be as murky

his death

in north carolina but soon moved with
his mother and his siblings

basketball star
